name: Food is life
description:
YOUR TEAM NAME OR YOUR DISCORD USERNAME.

Controls: Only mouse

OPTIONAL: BEST TECHNICAL FEATURES OF YOUR GAME?

OPTIONAL: WHO IN THE TEAM DID WHAT?
Ёю#1057 - Art, game-design, lvl-design, animation.
_ivan#9439 - code
Lyosha Lozhkin#2864 - Sound Design
Tjalvi#7354 - Music

food is life - Tower defense, where the player has to build a city and feed its inhabitants. 

We have everything unusual: Getting currency for contracts, where you get money for strengthening “enemies”. 

We have no defeat. Improvement of houses through the development of neighboring cells. 

The need to cut wood for construction Towers don't work the way you're used to, you'll have to put up with it. 

And a bunch of little things that you have not seen in games before. As well as beautiful music, sounds, animations and even code .
But don't be fooled by its visuals, the game is extremely intricate (and possibly hardcore) 

The game has a hint, it is not very informative, but it will help you understand the basics of the game.
